body:
Comment 49: This issue was updated by revision 343b4ba8c1ad8a29b6dd19cb101273b57a26c9b. 
This proposal disables Setuid and Setgid on all linux platforms.

issue #1435 has been open for a long time, and it is unlikely to be addressed soon so an
argument was made by a commenter

https://golang.org/issue/1435?c=45

That these functions should made to fail rather than succeed in their broken state.

LGTM=ruiu, iant
R=iant, ruiu
CC=golang-codereviews
https://golang.org/cl/106170043
